features: [Imaginative Creative Play] Pop, Crinkle, Pull, Stretch! Stimulate your child’s imagination and explore endless creative ways to play with our Pop Tubes! Create shapes, letters, and make up games for hours of entertainment. Our Pop Tubes stretch over 2 feet and can connect for even more fun. Marble races, hoola hoops, jump ropes - the list of ways to play has no end!

[Endless Fun for the Whole Family] We understand that nothing is more important than family, so we wanted to create a sensory toy that is designed for toddlers but loved by the whole family. Parents and kids can play along together for hours of fun! Our Pop Tubes are guaranteed to be a favorite toy in your home.

[Sensory & Learning] Pop Tubes make learning fun - the way it should be! These sensory toys provide tactile and auditory stimulation, as well as encourage the development of fine motor skills, bilateral coordination, and cause and effect STEM learning. The vibrant colors, smooth ridges, and satisfying crinkly noise stimulate your senses for super sensory fun!

[Why You'll Love Them] These wildly fun, addictive, durable, versatile, colorful, third-party tested Pop Tubes are the perfect fidget toys for kids! These super sensory toys provide hours of endless entertainment - no wonder kids love them!

[Unmatched Quality] With over 2 million Pop Tubes sold, BunMo is the leading brand in sensory toys. Designed with you in mind using high-quality BPA-free plastic which won't crack to ensure safety during play. If squished, our Pop Tubes can be easily fixed using a pen, knitting needle, or chopstick.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Are the pop tubes durable? Our Pop Tubes are highly durable. Made from sturdy materials, they can withstand extensive play. Squeeze, twist, or stretch them without worry. They're great for kids and adults who enjoy fidgeting, sensory play, and the satisfying popping sounds. Are the pop tubes noisy? Pop Tubes create sound when stretched or compressed, offering a satisfying popping experience. The noise level varies based on material and force used. People of all ages, including children and adults, find the sound enjoyable and calming. Are these pop tubes safe for young kids? Yes, these Pop Tubes are generally safe for young kids. They provide tactile and auditory stimulation but have sharp edges. Connect the ends to prevent injuries. Adult supervision is advised for safe and appropriate use. Are these pop tubes teachable toys? Pop Tubes are both entertaining and educational toys! These toys encourage imaginative play and enhance fine motor skills while improving hand-eye coordination with each stretch and pull. How many tubes come in a pack? Each pack contains four Pop Tubes, providing versatility and convenience. You can use them for sensory play, share with friends, or enjoy their satisfying pops yourself. With four tubes per pack, you'll have an ample supply for all your needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun little toy for toddlers
reviews.reviewText: My two year old grandson loves these. It's the most simple toys that often keep toddlers/babies attention. I think he loves the sound it makes when he scrunches it then pulls it apart. Actually I like it too. It's oddly soothing. Or maybe because it satisfies the fidget urge. Whatever the case these are compact, easy to travel with and because the box come with multiples, easy to have in various locations. They are all in different colors but serve the same function. I was a little worried though because he's chewed on a few of them. But it's actually "chew proof" in that he has not broken any little pieces off. I'm sure that's not what this toy is intended for but....he's a toddler who chews on things. The ends are just smashed with teeth marks. LOL He has them at home, in the car, at my house and in my car. This was another good purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars By far my son's favorite toy
reviews.reviewText: My one year old son get's so much use and fun out of these tubes. He plays with them all day, everyday. They were perfect for keeping him entertained on long flights at 10 months old. They have held up really well after months of daily play time. The little grooves are a bit difficult to clean in the event of a baby accidentally throwing up in one, which my son definitely did. I didn't have anything long enough or narrow enough to scrub inside of it. Had to clean it by spraying it with a lot of water, but it got clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 2 yr old Granddaughter LOVE these!
reviews.reviewText: Not only does the 2 yr like these the whole family does (including me - they let me have one). So much fun and so satisfying. They bend in so many directions. I would almost way you can't have too many of these because they connect and the designs you could make are endless. Such a reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got the large 8 pack. My kids and their cousins loved them. Great size from toddlers to big kids. My 3yr old loved them and so did the other kids 6+. All kinds of funny sounds and you can spin them in the air and they whistle!! Great for stocking stuffers or gift bags/party favor ideas

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Travel Lifesaver for Parents
reviews.reviewText: The BUNMO Pop Tubes were a game-changer for keeping my 7-year-old, Charlie, entertained on a long flight. These lightweight, portable tubes are perfect for travel, fitting easily into carry-on bags. They provided tactile and auditory fun, encouraging creativity with their stretchable and bendable design. Durable and safe, these tubes are an excellent choice for parents seeking an engaging and hassle-free travel toy for their children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids love these!
reviews.reviewText: These are so fun for kids and toddlers! My kids love the sound they make and how you can bend and commence them together. We will be getting more of these. Very easy to clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it, everyone will love it!
reviews.reviewText: I first bought these for my nephew and have now bought them as a stocking stuffer for my son. Both times as soon as they were opened everyone in the room from the toddler who got them up to their great grandma was interested, entertained, and taking turns playing with these. Hours of open ended, creative play. I can’t explain why they are so entertaining, they just are! They are so compact we bring them with us everywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My kids got this for Christmas and love them. They're fin to play with and make cool noises. Enough for each of my kids. They can link together to make longer hoses as well.

Kids love them. Great value for the price. One thing we love to do with them is connect them all and have one person go up to a bedroom while the other stays in the living room and talk to each other through them.
